title: Champion mains, who do you hate laning vs the most?
body: As a Diana main, it's hands down Mordekaiser. So glad there are literally 12 Mordekaiser players in NA. you poke out Iron Man with Crescent Strike over and over again, and when you finally poke him down enough, you try and burst him down but he refreshes his passive shield while getting hit with Qs with no escape. Then he turns you into a ghost and watch as your ghost takes down your turret at the speed of light. You literally are required to laneswap.

replies.body:
Playing against trundle as anyone

FUCK that ultimate

> [{quoted}](name=Moesnd,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtPzQaol,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-31T19:06:52.816+0000)
>
> Playing against trundle as anyone
> 
> FUCK that ultimate

THIS.

Especially as Akali toplane vs trundle top.
Akali isnt that much more fun tho lol
Garen. He doesn't die and he out trades me, every time. I don't think I've ever actually won against a Garen in lane :O

I don't understand Garen conceptually. Even if somehow you're beating him in lane, his passive punishes you for killing him, and he becomes so tanky regardless of how poorly he plays in lane that it doesn't even matter later if you do beat him.

>his passive punishes you for killing him

No, you cannot become the villain for killing Garen.

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtPzQaol,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-31T19:09:02.602+0000)
>
> I don't understand Garen conceptually. Even if somehow you're beating him in lane, his passive punishes you for killing him, and he becomes so tanky regardless of how poorly he plays in lane that it doesn't even matter later if you do beat him.

Pretty much this.

> [{quoted}](name=OurLestrade,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtPzQaol,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-31T19:03:39.885+0000)
>
> Garen. He doesn't die and he out trades me, every time. I don't think I've ever actually won against a Garen in lane :O

then youre definitely doing something wrong. spin does less damage than auto attacking until level 4. garen mains usually max q in lane right now because of it.

hes actually really really weak early game since the changes. youre either not managing your cooldowns properly to push him around, or youre too scared to fight him when the spin is on cooldown.

might also be an issue with wrong runes/masteries, but most likely some stratgic mistake.
E might do less damage but it shreds your armor with Balck cleaver and it lets you move while damaging them.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtPzQaol,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2016-08-01T00:34:32.859+0000)
>
> E might do less damage but it shreds your armor with Balck cleaver and it lets you move while damaging them.

he doesnt walk with cleaver into lane at lvl 1.

>he doesnt walk with cleaver into lane at lvl 1.

not with that attitude

{{champion:84}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:23}} the ''shut me down early but if im not 0-6 in five minutes, you lost'' type

{{champion:157}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:114}} the ''im toxic and not that good but i look cool doing standard plays'' type

{{champion:36}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:8}} the ''no cost ranged poke spamm'' type

{{champion:268}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:48}} the ''completely brokenlate game champion that are also lane bullies early game'' type

and last but not least {{champion:17}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:26}} the ''you wont have fun for the next 30 minutes and make LCS boring to watch(exept satan)'' kind
That is 21% of the league roster. With 5 players on the enemy team per game this means you will most likely face at least one of these every game. Thats a whole lot of angry games don't you think?

Cass is one of the worst champs for me right now. I totally get her concept and I think it's good'n'all, but I have no idea why Riot had to give any first time Cass Wood 5 player the ability to kite like an old Cass main after like 100 games. It just feels horrible to be kited to oblivion by people who never play adc or any kite intensive champions and then just proceed kiting like a pro while playing Cass for the first time...
Everyone knows how to deal with {{champion:53}} in theory, but he's just such an ASSHOLE that i ban him whenever I support because I don't wanna deal with his shit
Irelia. Fuck playing against irelia...
"Oh, look, I'm 3 kills down, 70 CS behind, and oh I just bought Triforce so I win."

As a top lane main who plays a lot of tanks { {{champion:36}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:78}} } 
{{champion:67}} IS BY FAR THE MOST ANNOYING CHAMPION IN LEAGUE. Seriously, fuck %hp damage.
I'm quite okay with %hp dmg but my fun definitely stops at it being true dmg.
As {{champion:99}}  it's yasuo. But if it's yasuo with warlords then I consider taking a bath with my toaster.

{{champion:99}} Demacia! _Fires ult_
{{champion:157}} Face the wind! _windwalls and spams mastery_

_You have slain an enemy._

Stay strong Lux. You can take him. As long as Yasuo players believe they can windwall every single hazard in the game.
It took me a really long time to realize Vi was not a projectile
What the hell did you expect to happen? For Vi to be destroyed if she hit the wall?
Yasuo - when the counter to a champion is them not understanding their own abilities.

Can I do this for the jungle?  Shaco.  Unless I am playing Lee Sin, and MAYYYYBE Nocturne, I can be sure one of two things are going to happen.

1. One of my buffs are going to be missing.
2. My entire health bar is going to be missing because he ignited me and my teammates never bothered to help me when he invaded, even though I warded and pinged.
{{champion:35}} For my next trick, I'll make you disappear!

Being an Ahri main, it has to be the Samurai wannabe simply because every time I get laned against them, they think it's cute to windwall minions right under my turret.  As well, I have to stay in lane because he'll just shove and take my tower if I decide to roam to another lane assuming he lets me push up beyond the little jungle lane on my side of the river.
being anyone its gotta be yasuo

As one of those supposed 12 Mordekaiser players in NA (yay being an unintentional hipster!), one of the champions I just hate to face when playing the Iron Revenant is Cassiopeia. No matter what stage of the game, you are not going to have a good time since you have no form of mobility and CC and she can just kite you for days, and she hurts when she does it.

Blitzcrank.

It doesnt matter how good I play. It doesnt matter how hard I work to shove the fucker out of lane. I can dodge that shit all fucking day but if I screw up ONCE, I lose. No matter how well I was playing previously, ONE minor mistake sends me to the fucking grave. 


 Lategame, its even worse. All he needs to do is land _one_ good hook on my adc or midlaner and its fucking game over.

{{champion:143}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:134}} I play these 3 as my "mains"

The champ I hate to face the most is Yasuo. His infinite dashes are so FUCKING annoying. And so is the damn windwall

Also {{champion:105}} , but I'd rather even the fish than Yasuo.

How do you have a problem against yas with {{champion:69}}?
Your miasa makes it where he can't dash or ult you, and his windwall doesn't stop your ult or your Q.

Leblanc. It's impossible to hit any skillshot of any kind on her because she just dashes or blinks away. Not to mention if you try to get ganks she has two dashes, and she has a passive that makes her invisible. And I swear, 90% I take I guess I attack the clone when her passive procs, not her.

Facing Yasuo as Jayce. Your early game range nukes do no damage because of the passive + there's windwall if you do manage to get an opening (and this is when it's more obvious you're going to try the combo). You also can't trade very well with the knock back because he can just dash back at you with a minion.

As Nami, worst Support matchups (for me) are probably Sona and Thresh with Leona as an honorable mention. Worst ADC matchups are the ones with long range basic attacks, so Caitlyn and Jinx.

Sona just trades way better than Nami does and is easier to be efficient with her spells (Nami can more easily miss or not hit max targets). Thresh is Thresh. Leona will get you killed every time she hits a Zenith Blade if her ADC is on the same page.

Cait and Jinx's range just make it difficult to safely trade since they can hit you far enough away to not draw minion aggro but not so much for you.

I main ADC and I hate laning vs C9 Sneaky because its always too easy and I like challenges. https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTAFw6Vlf1Cx71ljhPG6THzeenPCYHuUEB-pHN9nJtBZC3TFQpVnBlgJoI

{{champion:18}} is my main. I hate laning against these assholes:{{champion:236}} {{champion:51}}{{champion:119}} . They all make my life a living hell. Cant trade with lucian, cant farm when theres a cait, cant do nether when there's a draven. Heaven forbid they have a kill support.

As a {{champion:37}}  main, very likely I'd have to say {{champion:89}} . Now don't get me wrong, I hate facing a {{champion:412}}  or a {{champion:53}} , but at least with those two I can hide behind my minions, but with Leona she lands one E and I can no longer move for three years and it's a guaranteed death unless her adc is a brainless monkey.

{{champion:82}} 
Basically anyone I can't completely and utterly dominate in the laning phase.

Morde's early is his weakest point by far (it's not bad though, huh...) and he relies on being able to shield himself from ganks by keeping the enemy down and warding up.

Soo, I'd say my least favorite matchups are either {{champion:104}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:48}} and the enemy Jungler

I have over 320k Mastery on {{champion:99}} and I'd rather deal with any assassin ({{champion:238}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} ) than with this shit: {{champion:157}} 
I hate how that free windwall every 20secs just renders me helpless to attack or retaliate
I hate how he constantly dashes between minions just for the sake of doing it
I hate that I have to proc his shield first
I hate that he buys 2 items and ends up with 100% crit

I hate him.

Rumble top: hate darius/garen (lack counterplay for melee apart from "leave lane)
Naut jungle: hate graves/yi (self explanatory)
Velkoz mid: hate lulu/annie (lulu counters my ult, annie is annie)
Varus adc: hate kalista/blitz (both annoying af)
Tahm kench support: hate sona/lux (One doesn't need to aim, the other has broken hit boxes)

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtPzQaol,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2016-07-31T22:23:04.286+0000)
>
> (lack counterplay for melee apart from ''leave lane)

xDDDD

Can't tell if that's "xDDDD" you're bad or "xDDDD" so true XD
Lel plz clarify
i just thought its funny :s

As a Katarina main, I hate laning against any good Annie, Yasuo, or Brand. If they are any good then they will anal Kat hard. Although if any of those 3 slip up during early laning, then I can easily take control.

Yasuo is annoying in the sense that I'm not allowed to trade with him during the early stages unless he fucks up (BS 175 as range and stacking AP dmg dash) Brand for the fact that he gets both burst and sustain dmg ugh. VS Annie can go both ways depending her stats and if she knows how to harass

As a Garen I hate laning against Darius and Ekko. Darius's spammable sustain is a pain when you have shit sustain in your kit, and Ekko just rewinds the moment he's low enough to get ulted making lvl 6 all ins pointless.
As a Teemo main, I cry inside whenever I see a Pantheon...

I play things like zyra, nami, karma, ect and I hate sivir and morgana. Like in practice it's not too awful dealing with the spell shields but it's still annoying. Also Blitz. I don't get hooked in the laning phase very often but still I hate him out of the laning phase and I feel like the threat of the hook is enough to make me back off the poke and engages a lot which is super annoying.

If you can't beat them join them :^)

#Morganamasterrace
